channel.title: Need Help With Player Has Logged In Etc Please!
channel.description: When somebody loggs into my game it comes up with lord_zero has logged in. i want it to come up with Lord Zero has logged in. none of that underscore _ or non capital stuff i tried going into character file and editing the names because they are notepad files saved as lord_zero etc but when i go and log in it says invalid username or pass please help it would be much appreciated

item.title: Need Help With Player Has Logged In Etc Please!
item.dc:creator: @Poon_Toon Poon Toon
item.description:
@Poon_Toon wrote:

[quote=“DAWIGG, post:2, topic:21467”]put this under log in message…

if(playerRights >= 0)
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Lord Zero has logged in”;[/quote]

that should work man lol

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Player Has Logged In Etc Please!

item.title: Need Help With Player Has Logged In Etc Please!
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Zero Lord Zero
item.description:
@Lord_Zero wrote:

yea but i want it to do it for all players like right now it has playername+"has logged in
not just my name?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Player Has Logged In Etc Please!
